column4: is this a repository https://launchpad.net/~philip/+archive/extra ? How to format the line correctly to add it repositories list
That address doesn't point to anything. As far as I can tell, user ~philip has no PPA.
(I don't do support in PM.) Perhaps you mean https://launchpad.net/~philip5/+archive/extra ?
if so, that page has instructions for adding it to your software sources.
